text: The Catered Affair is a 1956 American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by Richard Brooks and was based on the 1955 play of the same name by Paddy Chayefsky. It stars Bette Davis, Ernest Borgnine, Debbie Reynolds, Barry Fitzgerald, Rod Taylor, Robert F. Simon and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn- Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1956 romantic comedy movies Category:1956 romantic drama movies Category:1950s comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Brooks Category:Movies about weddings
title: The Catered Affair
